mapper.select: SELECT PD.PD_CODE, PD.PD_DATE, PD.PD_NAME, STK.STK_STOCK FROM PRODUCT PD INNER JOIN STOCK STK ON PD.PD_DATE = STK.PD_DATE AND PD.PD_CODE = STK.PD_CODE AND PD.C_CODE = STK.C_CODE AND PD.PDC_CODE = STK.PDC_CODE AND PD.PDC_DATE = STK.PDC_DATE WHERE PD.C_CODE = '123123123123' ORDER BY PD.PD_DATE;
